properties.description: Attractive three bedroom semi-detached family home situated within 0.5 miles of Petts Wood station with fast trains to London and within easy walking distance of local shops, schools, bus routes and National Trust woodland. The property comprises; two receptions, fitted 18'9 x 10'1 kitchen/breakfast room and conservatory. The property also benefits from having a utility room and cloakroom. To the first floor there are three bedrooms and a family bathroom with separate WC. Additional features include double glazing, gas central heating and a well presented interior...
properties.location: Petts Wood Road, Petts Wood, Orpington BR5

properties.description: Presented in excellent decorative order throughout is this two double bedroom, two bathroom, garden flat.The modern fitted kitchen is open plan to the living room which boasts solid wooden floors and includes integrated appliances including a dishwasher & a washing machine. This large open plan benefits from bi folding doors onto a secluded private courtyard garden. Both bedrooms are double sized, and the family bathroom boasts a matching three piece suite a shower attachment over the bath. There is also a separate wet room. There are walnut doors throughout and wiring for Sky TV/aerial points in the living room/kitchen and both bedrooms.This apartment being only five years old, is still under a 10 year building guarantee..

Spacious four-bedroom detached house with a large garden and double garage. Recently renovated with modern amenities while retaining its original charm. Features include a state-of-the-art kitchen, open plan living area, and a master bedroom with en-suite bathroom...

Modern one-bedroom apartment in a newly built development. Perfect for first-time buyers or investors. The property features an open-plan kitchen and living area, a spacious bedroom, and a stylish bathroom. Residents have access to communal gardens and secure parking...

Stunning five-bedroom Victorian house with period features throughout. This family home offers spacious living areas, a large kitchen with an Aga, and a beautifully landscaped garden. The property also includes a self-contained annex, perfect for multi-generational living or rental income...

Luxurious three-bedroom penthouse apartment with panoramic views of London. This property features a large open-plan living area, a modern kitchen with high-end appliances, and three well-sized bedrooms, including a master suite with walk-in wardrobe. The apartment also benefits from a private roof terrace and secure underground parking...

Charming two-bedroom cottage in a picturesque village setting. This property has been lovingly restored, combining traditional features with modern comforts. It includes a cozy living room with a wood-burning stove, a country-style kitchen, and a beautiful cottage garden...

Bright and spacious two-bedroom apartment in a converted Victorian mansion. This property features high ceilings, large windows, and period details throughout. The apartment includes a modern fitted kitchen, a spacious living room, and access to communal gardens...
